text: ivvāṟē, ātu, samūtu (camūkattāraiyum aḻittōm); aṉṟiyum avarkaḷ vacitta iṭaṅkaḷiliruntu (oru cila ciṉṉaṅkaḷ) uṅkaḷukkut teḷivāka teṉpaṭukiṉṟaṉa ēṉeṉil ṣaittāṉ avarkaḷuṭaiya (tīc)ceyalkaḷai avarkaḷukku aḻakākak kāṇpittu avarkaḷ nallaṟivu paṭaittavarkaḷāka iruntum, avarkaḷai nērvaḻiyil (pōka viṭātu) taṭuttu viṭṭāṉ
